r.d: The HTTP class is a class with static methods for doing miscellaneous HTTP related stuff like date formatting, language negotiation or HTTP redirection.
r.n: * Fixed bug #7130 - HTTP::absoluteUri("?foo") loses path * Fixed bug #12672 - PHP_SELF ending on / causes incorrect redirects * Fixed bug #12571 - Wrong license in package.xml * Fixed bug #12759 - DOS linebreaks * Fixed req #9148 - Added negotiateCharset() method * Fixed req #11060 - Added negotiateMimeType() method * Added regression tests * Bump to package.xml v2.0 * Added failover JavaScript for redirect()
